overview:
A CPA that has been working in private industry for several years. Focus has been to provide financial and operational expertise to start-up and high-growth companies.

Team player with proven track record in providing exceptional financial and operational expertise to growth companies. Motivated to increase the accuracy and timeliness of financial reporting through improved processes and controls. Develops financial budgeting and successfully manages cash flow needs through economic up and down periods. Manages staff to maximize output for accounting, information technology, human resources and product distribution. Extensive participation in the sale of companies to maximize gains to shareholders. Maintains productive relationships with bankers, attorneys, outside accountants and vendors.
